# Introduction

This document provides comprehensive API reference documentation for the METT Data Portal, including examples in three formats:

- **Friendly CLI**: High-level `mett` commands with intuitive syntax
- **Generic CLI**: Lower-level `mett api request` commands for direct API access
- **cURL**: Raw HTTP requests for integration with any HTTP client

All examples assume the following environment variables:

- `METT_BASE_URL` (defaults to `https://www.gut-microbes.org` if unset)
- `METT_JWT` for endpoints that require experimental access

::: {.callout-note}
## Authentication

- **Public endpoints** (species, genomes search, etc.) work without credentials
- **Experimental endpoints** (drugs, proteomics, fitness, etc.) require a JWT token set via `METT_JWT` environment variable or `~/.mett/config.toml`
:::

# Core APIs

## System & Health

### Get TTP metadata

Get metadata about the TTP dataset including counts, available compounds, and score ranges.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett ttp metadata --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/ttp/metadata \
  --format json
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/ttp/metadata"
```

:::

## Species

### Get all species

Get all available species

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett species list --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/species/ \
  --format json
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/species/"
```

:::

### Get genomes by species

Retrieves genomes under a given species with pagination and sorting.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/species/{species_acronym}/genomes"
```

:::

### Search genomes by species and query string

Performs a search for genomes within a specific species with pagination and sorting.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/species/{species_acronym}/genomes/search"
```

:::

## Genomes

### Get all genomes

Retrieves a paginated list of all genomes available in the system. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name' or 'species'. 

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genomes list --page 1 --per-page 5 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genomes/ \
  --format json \
  --query page=1 \
  --query per_page=5
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/?page=1&per_page=5"
```

:::

### Get genomes by isolate names

Retrieves genome records for one or more isolate names. Accepts a comma-separated list of isolate names as input. Useful for batch lookups when isolate identifiers are known.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genomes by-isolates --isolate BU_909,BU_61 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genomes/by-isolate-names \
  --format json \
  --query isolates=BU_909,BU_61
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/by-isolate-names?isolates=BU_909"
```

:::

### Search genomes by query

Searches genomes using a free-text query string. Returns a paginated list of matching genome records. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name' or 'species'.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genomes search --query PV_H4 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genomes/search \
  --format json \
  --query query=PV_H4
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/search?query=&sortField=species&sortOrder=asc"
```

:::

### Get all type strains

Returns a list of genomes that are designated as type strains. Type strains represent reference genomes for a given species and are essential for comparative analysis and classification.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genomes type-strains --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genomes/type-strains \
  --format json
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/type-strains"
```

:::

### Get all drug data for a strain

Retrieves both drug MIC and metabolism data for a specific strain. Returns comprehensive drug response information including resistance and metabolism patterns. No pagination is applied as this endpoint returns complete datasets for both MIC and metabolism data.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/{isolate_name}/drug-data"
```

:::

### Get drug metabolism data for a strain

Retrieves drug metabolism data for a specific strain. Returns paginated degradation percentages, statistical significance, and metabolizer classifications.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/{isolate_name}/drug-metabolism"
```

:::

### Get drug MIC data for a strain

Retrieves drug MIC (Minimum Inhibitory Concentration) data for a specific strain. Returns paginated MIC measurements including drug names, values, units, and experimental conditions.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/{isolate_name}/drug-mic"
```

:::

### Get essentiality data by genome and contig

Retrieves cached essentiality data for a given genome isolate and reference name (e.g. contig_1). Returns gene essentiality information grouped by contig. This data is typically precomputed and used to visualize gene essentiality in genome browsers or analysis tools.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/{isolate_name}/essentiality/{ref_name}"
```

:::

### Get genes by genome isolate

Retrieves a paginated list of genes associated with a specific genome isolate. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name', 'gene_name', 'alias', 'seq_id', 'locus_tag' and 'product'. Useful for viewing all genes within a selected genome.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genomes/{isolate_name}/genes"
```

:::

## Genes

### Get all genes

Retrieves a paginated list of all genes across all available genomes. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name', 'gene_name', 'alias', 'seq_id', 'locus_tag' and 'product'. Useful for browsing the full gene catalog without applying filters.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genes list --page 1 --per-page 10 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genes/ \
  --format json \
  --query page=1 \
  --query per_page=10
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/?page=1&per_page=10"
```

:::

### Search genes by query string

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genes search --query dnaA --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genes/search \
  --format json \
  --query query=dnaA
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/search?query=dnaA"
```

:::

### Advanced gene search across genomes and species

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett genes search-advanced --per-page 10 --sort-field seq_id --sort-order asc --isolate BU_909 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/genes/search/advanced \
  --format json \
  --query query= \
  --query per_page=10 \
  --query sort_field=seq_id \

  --query isolates=BU_909
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/search/advanced?query=&per_page=10&sort_field=seq_id&sort_order=asc&isolates=BU_909"
```

:::

### Get gene by locus tag

Retrieves detailed information for a specific gene using its unique locus tag. Returns metadata and functional annotation associated with the gene. This endpoint is useful for direct lookups when the locus tag is already known.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}"
```

:::

### Get correlations for a gene

Get all genes correlated with a specific gene, ordered by correlation strength

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash

```

:::

Retrieves essentiality data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with essentiality data including TnSeq metrics, essentiality calls, and experimental conditions.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL


:::

### Get fitness data for a gene

Retrieves fitness data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with fitness data including log fold change, FDR, and experimental conditions.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/fitness"
```

:::

### Get mutant growth data for a gene

Retrieves mutant growth data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with mutant growth data including doubling times, biological replicates, and experimental conditions.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/mutant-growth"
```

:::

### Get operons containing a gene

Get all operons that contain a specific gene

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/operons"
```

:::

### Get orthologs for a gene

Get all orthologous genes for a specific gene across species

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/orthologs"
```

:::

### Get proteomics evidence for a gene

Retrieves proteomics evidence data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with all proteomics evidence entries including coverage, unique peptides, unique intensity, and evidence flag.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/proteomics"
```

:::

### Get reactions data for a gene

Retrieves metabolic reactions data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with reaction identifiers, GPR rules, and metabolites.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/genes/{locus_tag}/reactions"
```

:::


# Experimental APIs

## Drugs

### Get metabolism data by drug name

Retrieves metabolism data for a specific drug across all strains. Supports pagination and optional species filtering.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/drugs/metabolism/by-drug/{drug_name}"
```

:::

### Search drug metabolism data

Search drug metabolism data across all strains. Supports filtering by drug name, class, species, statistical significance, degradation percentages, and experimental conditions. Returns paginated results with detailed metabolism measurements. Note: Sorting is limited to top-level fields (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name).

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett drugs metabolism-search --drug-class beta_lactam --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/drugs/metabolism/search \
  --format json \
  --query drug_class=beta_lactam
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/drugs/metabolism/search"
```

:::

### Get MIC data by drug name

Retrieves MIC data for a specific drug across all strains. Supports pagination and optional species filtering.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/drugs/mic/by-drug/{drug_name}"
```

:::

### Search drug MIC data

Search drug MIC (Minimum Inhibitory Concentration) data across all strains. Supports filtering by drug name, class, species, MIC values, and experimental conditions. Returns paginated results with detailed MIC measurements. Note: Sorting is limited to top-level fields (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name).

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett drugs mic --drug-name amoxicillin --species BU --page 1 --per-page 10 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/drugs/mic/search \
  --format json \
  --query drug_name=amoxicillin \
  --query species_acronym=BU \
  --query page=1 \
  --query per_page=10
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/drugs/mic/search"
```

:::

## Proteomics

### Search proteomics evidence by locus tags and/or UniProt IDs

Search for proteomics evidence data across multiple genes using locus tags and/or UniProt IDs. Supports filtering by minimum coverage, minimum unique peptides, and evidence flag. Returns an array of genes with their proteomics evidence data.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett proteomics search --locus-tag BU_ATCC8492_00002 --uniprot A7V2F0 --uniprot A6L272 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/proteomics/search \
  --format json \
  --query locus_tags=BU_ATCC8492_00002 \
  --query uniprot_ids=A7V2F0,A6L272
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/proteomics/search?locus_tags=BU_ATCC8492_00002&uniprot_ids=A7V2F0,A6L272"
```

:::


:::

# Interactions APIs

## PPI

### Search protein-protein interactions

Search for protein-protein interactions with various filtering options. Can search by protein_id (UniProt ID) or locus_tag.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett ppi interactions --species PV --page 1 --per-page 10 --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/ppi/interactions \
  --format json \
  --query species_acronym=PV \
  --query page=1 \
  --query per_page=10
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/ppi/interactions?locus_tag=BU_ATCC8492_01788&species_acronym=BU&per_page=5"
```

:::

### Get all protein neighbors (raw data)

Get all neighbors for a specific protein without algorithm processing. Returns raw interaction data for custom analysis in Jupyter notebooks. Can search by protein_id (UniProt ID) or locus_tag.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett ppi neighbors --protein-id A6KXK8 --n 5 --species PV --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/ppi/neighbors \
  --format json \
  --query protein_id=A6KXK8 \
  --query n=5 \
  --query species_acronym=PV
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/ppi/neighbors?protein_id=A6KXK8&n=5&species_acronym=PV"
```

:::

### Get PPI network properties

Get network properties (nodes, edges, density, clustering) for a specific score type and threshold

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett ppi network-properties --score-type abundance_score --score-threshold 0.95 --species PV --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request GET /api/ppi/network-properties \
  --format json \
  --query score_type=abundance_score \
  --query score_threshold=0.95 \
  --query species_acronym=PV
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X GET "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/ppi/network-properties?score_type=abundance_score&score_threshold=0.95&species_acronym=PV"
```

:::

### Get PPI network data

Get network data for a specific score type and threshold

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### cURL

### Search

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Friendly CLI

```bash
mett pyhmmer search --format json
```

#### Generic CLI

```bash
mett api request POST /api/pyhmmer/search \
  --format json \
  --header content-type:application/json
```

#### cURL

```bash
curl -X POST "${METT_BASE_URL:-https://www.gut-microbes.org}/api/pyhmmer/search" \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{
    "database": "bu_type_strains",
    "threshold": "evalue",
    "threshold_value": 0.01,
    "input": ">test_dna\nATGAGTGAAATAGATCATGTCGGGCTGTGGAACCGCTGTCTTGAAATCATCAG",
    "popen": 0.02,
    "pextend": 0.4
}'
```
